__e: So don't take it too hard, and tell us just one person
- What can I do for you?
Well, at least give us some time, 'cause if you kill them all, we'll never learn what's causing this behavior.
Please give us your blessing even if you can't come to the wedding.
Please, give us your professional opinion.
Give us your name, what can that hurt?
Give us the names of the guys in your crew.
At least... provide us the weapons we need in order to defend ourselves.
Then how about you give us the names of whoever you think he might go to, and we go from there?
Okay, people, give us a minute.
- There's only one way to find out.
Since you met my colleague, give us a minute to change your mind.
Do whatever you want and give us another week.

But no one's gonna come see it, sir, unless you tell them to, so I am begging you, please... give us another chance.

Any information you could provide us with. Well, if you think of anything that might be helpful. Okay.
